games.title: Rooftop Run
games.description:
Rooftop Run ‚Äì Race Across the City! üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüí®

Run, jump, and slide over rooftops in this fast-paced parkour game! Dodge obstacles, smash through barriers, and escape from enemies as you race through exciting levels.
games.howToPlayText:
üî• Game Features:

Cool Parkour Moves ‚Äì Jump, roll, and slide to keep running.

Fast Levels ‚Äì Complete thrilling challenges and master your skills.

Simple Controls ‚Äì Easy to learn, fun to play!

üñ•Ô∏è Desktop Controls:

‚Üë (Up Arrow) ‚Äì Move up

‚Üì (Down Arrow) ‚Äì Move down

‚Üê (Left Arrow) ‚Äì Move left

‚Üí (Right Arrow) ‚Äì Move right

üì± Mobile Controls:

Be the best parkour runner! Play Rooftop Run now and start your adventure!

games.title: Geometry Arrow 2
games.description:
Geometry Arrow 2 ‚Äî the sequel to the dynamic arcade game about an arrow navigating through a dangerous cave.

The goal is simple: reach the end of the cave and survive. Along the way, you'll have to dodge a variety of unique and challenging obstacles.

In this new chapter, a second playable character ‚Äî the Wheel ‚Äî joins the adventure!
You can now customize your arrow and wheel with different skins, as well as change particle effects and block textures to make the game feel truly yours.

The game features 6 levels with increasing difficulty. Each level combines both Arrow and Wheel gameplay segments, offering variety and challenge.

Unlock achievements as you progress and show off your skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Choose one of the 6 levels in the menu and start the game by clicking it with the left mouse button, the SPACEBAR or your finger.

PC controls:

‚îÄ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or SPACEBAR ‚îÄ arrow movement;
‚îÄ ESCAPE ‚îÄ exit the level.

MOBILE controls:

‚îÄ TOUCHING THE SCREEN ‚îÄ movement of the arrow.

games.title: Barry Prison: Parkour Escape!
games.description: Join the exhilarating adventure of Barry Prison: Parkour Escape! Navigate complex parkour obstacles, outsmart Warden Barry, and gather items like coins and jetpacks to execute your escape. Play for free on your phone or computer and prove your skills in this ultimate test of freedom!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:

üíªComputer:
Mouse - camera rotation
WASD - movement
Space - jump
Enter - use items
Shift - jetpack
Tab - menu

üì± Mobile device:
Use the interface buttons on the screen

games.title: Geometry Arrow
games.description:
Geometry Arrow
The game is about an arrow in a cave with obstacles.

The goal of to get to the end of the cave (to the portal) alive. Along the way, you need to dodge unique obstacles and spikes. There are 6 levels in the game, each subsequent one is more difficult than the previous one.

Choose one of the 13 levels in the menu and start the game by clicking with the left mouse button or with your finger on the screen.
games.howToPlayText:
Geometry Arrow
The game is about an arrow in a cave with obstacles.

The goal of to get to the end of the cave (to the portal) alive. Along the way, you need to dodge unique obstacles and spikes. There are 6 levels in the game, each subsequent one is more difficult than the previous one.

Choose one of the 13 levels in the menu and start the game by clicking with the left mouse button or with your finger on the screen.

PC controls:

‚îÄ LEFT MOUSE BUTTON or SPACEBAR ‚îÄ arrow movement.

MOBILE controls:

‚îÄ TOUCHING THE SCREEN ‚îÄ arrow movement.

games.title: Robby The Lava Tsunami
games.description: Robby The Lava Tsunami is an exciting free-to-play online game where you race against a flowing lava wave. Enjoy a colorful setting, unique skills, and endless customization options. Perfect for fans of speed and acrobatics, it‚Äôs accessible on iOS, Android, and desktop. Test your skills and strive for victory!
games.howToPlayText:
Control (computer):
‚óè WASD - Movement
‚óè Mouse - Camera Overview
‚óè Space - Jump
‚óè Tab or Escape Pause
‚óè Keys 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Activating abilities

Control (phone):
‚óè Using the game interface
‚óè Move in any place - Camera view

games.title: Steve parkour in mine
games.description:
Jump, run, and don‚Äôt fall! Help Steve navigate dangerous levels filled with traps, chasms, and true cubic madness.

The levels keep getting harder, and your reaction speed and jumping precision are your only hope.

This game is perfect for both beginners and those who consider themselves masters of parkour in virtual worlds.

Are you ready to show what Steve is capable of in the world of parkour?
games.howToPlayText: Use the WASD keys to control the character. Press the spacebar to jump. Use the mouse to control the camera.

games.title: Mine Jump
games.description: Join the exciting world of Mine Jump, an engaging online experience that merges quick thinking with rapid actions. Explore a captivating realm where each jump reveals hidden treasures. Enhance your character and uncover the mysteries of an alien planet, all while enjoying the thrill on any device!
games.howToPlayText:
Jump, jump, jump! A challenging reaction and logic game that won't let you get bored! Collect slugs, pump up your hero and find the edge of this planet!

Click on the left or right side of the screen to move diagonally on a cell. If you make a mistake, you can go back. Get as far as you can to find out all the secrets of this mysterious planet!

games.title: Your Obby Parkour
games.description:
Enter a thrilling world of non-stop challenges! Run, jump, dodge, and conquer in the ultimate parkour platformer! 
Survive crazy levels ‚Äî from burning lava and icy slides to water traps and mysterious portals. Watch out for trampolines, spinning traps, and tons of hidden paths!

Play with friends and travel through fun regions ‚Äî from simple to brutally hard! Discover the hidden little dragon, collect trophies, and unlock secret shortcuts and bonus zones!

Be careful of:
Deadly skeletons
Lava-filled volcanoes
Slippery ice paths
Horror mazes where it's easy to get lost!

Ready to be a true parkour master? Find the fastest paths, conquer extreme stages, and show the world your skills!

Perfect for fans of obby-style maps, parkour games, secrets, adventures, and multiplayer fun!
games.howToPlayText:
The goal: get to the end.

Control:
WASD - movement.
Space bar - jump.
TAB - pause.
Shift - cursor.
Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.

On the phone:
Use the game interface.
